data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carvalho, Mariana De S., Da Silva, Suzane M., Pinheiro, Ulisses (2013): Two new species of Aaptos (Demospongiae, Hadromerida) from Brazil (western Atlantic). Zootaxa 3750 (4): 357-366, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3750.4.4
